SEARCH
Package gw.api.calendar

Class CalendarState

java.lang.Object
gw.api.calendar.CalendarState
public class CalendarState extends Object
The state of the calendar, including the current day, user selected day and filter setting information. This is a very simple object, just a convenient way to keep the state.
Author:
jhuang

      public void setCalendarType(String calendarType)

    • setChanged

      public void setChanged(boolean changed)
      Sets the changed flag, currently this flag is used by calendarWidget, if the widget detects a change in any of of the calendar state parameters, this flage will be set to true and the data will be re-fetched.
      Parameters:
      changed - The value used to set the changed flag
      See Also:
      • isChanged()

      Parameters:
